title: Overlay: ffmpeg path override + version capture
scope: Support ffmpeg path override via environment variable for controlled environments.
Capture best-effort ffmpeg version string for reporting/debugging.
acceptance: Overlay renderer uses PATH or FUSBAL_FFMPEG_PATH override.
A best-effort ffmpeg version first-line is captured and surfaced in reporting/logging (without failing if probing fails).
Unit tests cover override behavior via mocking.

deliverables.title: Override + version probing
acceptance: Missing ffmpeg errors mention PATH/override and include install guidance.
